name: Nick Meyne
bio: During a career in IT as a Chief Architect, Nick designed and led the architectural governance of several very large and centralised international IT programmes. He is now a committed de-centralist and believer in community-led co-operative projects. He is active in the #DGOV movement, including working on decentralised digital identity projects.  He occasionally blogs on topics such as platform design, trade and social exchange in various channels including his own smtngood.eu. He is an engineer and economist and in his spare time he likes to fix, skipper and navigate sailing vessels of all sizes.
